markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gaping Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=2521) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
A creature you are aware of damages you with a melee Strike.

</column>

---

Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure). It can't recover from the sickened condition while it's adjacent to you.
name: Gaping Flesh
